Notes, comments and discussion about changes in my branch.

= Changes =

 * jQuery UI 1.7.2 integration
 * created a [http://alturl.com/m4pf jQuery UI theme] with grappelli's colors
 * removed Bookmark.js, created a jQuery widget
 * removed Changelist.js, created a jQuery widget
 * created jquery.grappelli.js which contains grappelli widgets

= Template blocks =

== javascripts.init ==

Javascript initialization takes place in a block called "javascript.init" which is inside
the block "javascripts". This block will be used to override JavaScript options.

{{{

{% block javascripts.init  %}
    $(function(){
        $('#bookmarks').gBookmarks({url: '{% url grp_bookmark_get %}'});
        $('.changelist-content').gChangelist();
        $('#content-main fieldset').gCollapsedFieldsets(); 
    });
{% endblock %}

}}}


= Widgets =

== ui.gBookmarks ==

Replacement for Bookmark.js.

=== Options ===

|| *options*  || *default* || *description* ||
|| url  || `/grappelli/bookmark/get/` || URL for the Ajax loading of bookmarks ||
|| effects || `false` || Use UI effects ||


== ui.gChangelist ==

Replacement for Changelist.js.


== ui.gCollapsedFieldsets ==

Replacement for CollapsedFieldsets
